# awesome-flex

Also check [Flex Item](../awesome-flex-item/readme.md).

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                                                   | Type     | Default |
| -------------- | --------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `baseFraction` | `base-fraction` | The number of portions that the flex container is split into. | `number` | `12`    |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name    | Description                  |
| ------- | ---------------------------- |
| `--lg`  | The view breakpoint for lg.  |
| `--md`  | The view breakpoint for md.  |
| `--sm`  | The view breakpoint for sm.  |
| `--xl`  | The view breakpoint for xl.  |
| `--xs`  | The view breakpoint for xs.  |
| `--xxl` | The view breakpoint for xxl. |
